title: In the previous activities you learned about analysis and working of searching algorithms. In this activity there are few questions please answer those questions

quizDescription.text: In this problem, we'll examine how indirection works. Consider the following definitions:

questions.questionText:
What is the value of the following expressions? If you think there will be an error, please type in 'error' (without quotes) in the input box
a[0]

What is the value of the following expressions? If you think there will be an error, please type in 'error' (without quotes) in the input box
b[1]

What is the value of the following expressions? If you think there will be an error, please type in 'error' (without quotes) in the input box
a[a[1]]

What is the value of the following expressions? If you think there will be an error, please type in 'error' (without quotes) in the input box
b[b[2]]

What is the value of the following expressions? If you think there will be an error, please type in 'error' (without quotes) in the input box
a[b[2]]

What is the value of the following expressions? If you think there will be an error, please type in 'error' (without quotes) in the input box
c[a[b[3]]]

What is the value of the following expressions? If you think there will be an error, please type in 'error' (without quotes) in the input box
a[c[a[b[0]]]]

What is the value of the following expressions? If you think there will be an error, please type in 'error' (without quotes) in the input box
a[c[a[b[3]]]]
